data.risk_item: Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine
data.finding_summary: A direct relationship was established in September 2023 when Nanjing University, along with other universities in Xianlin University Town, signed a "health service cooperation agreement" with the Zidong campus of the Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine. The agreement aims to provide health services to faculty and staff. Additionally, a 2020 clinical trial protocol for a study on gastric cancer lists authors from both the "Traditional Chinese Medicine Department, Jinling Hospital, School of Medicine, Nanjing University" and the "Department of Oncology, Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine," indicating direct collaboration on research. It is critical to note that the Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine is primarily and formally the affiliated hospital of Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, a separate institution from Nanjing University.

key_evidence.text: The agreement aims to provide health services to faculty and staff.

Additionally, a 2020 clinical trial protocol for a study on gastric cancer lists authors from both the \"Traditional Chinese Medicine Department, Jinling Hospital, School of Medicine, Nanjing University\" and the \"Department of Oncology, Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine,\" indicating direct collaboration on research.

It is critical to note that the Jiangsu Province Hospital of Chinese Medicine is primarily and formally the affiliated hospital of Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, a separate institution from Nanjing University.
